alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ellis County through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hays, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hays around 545 PM CDT. Toulon around 550 PM CDT. Victoria around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Catherine and Emmeram. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
